reviewText: Enchanting movie, Ioseliani is a first class director, known first in Georgia, Russia, and then in France. I can watch his movies over and over again, every time as beautiful as first time.

Otar Ioseliani is a wonderful Georgian Director. He has his own very special cinematographic language which you will always recognize if you watch his films once. His first films were made in Soviet time in Republic of Georgia ("Once upon a Time There Lived a Singing Blackbird" and some others). Then he emigrated to France and "Favorites of the Moon" was the first film which he made there. It is a very special comedy with such a nice "Georgian" humor transferred to French background. I think you'll enjoy it just give yourself a little time to be involved in its events...
